1.0.name: wordpress/newsboard
1.0.description:
View Live Demo | Watch the Youtube video | Follow us on Twitter | Find us on Facebook

NewsBoard is a highly customizable jQuery News Ticker that displays your posts or rss feed from other sites. You can easily set width, height, colors, rollover colors, date format, thumbnail sizes, fonts, transitions, speed and much more.

Works on all modern browsers
NewsBoard takes advantage of CSS3 features like border radius, gradients and text shadow, which are supported by all modern browsers. But those who don\'
